title: The Heretic Priest
description: "YOU FOOL, HE HAS BETRAYED YOU." The war between gods is nowhere near over. As They continue to pit Their favorites against one another, the stakes are raised; deals are made and alliances are shattered. While Pharun and Encarz prepare to war against each other, Felix is left to pick up the pieces of his life. And who should care to help him but the angel of a very unlikely god? Choosing between love and Death is not so easy as it seems.
author: C.N. Faust
